snippet.title: Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic Games (3DS) - Story Mode Playthrough Part 1
snippet.description:
I deleted this Playthrough earlier due to the fear of Sega taking it down. Since the game came out two years ago and there's a more recent M&S game out now, I don't think they would mind. 

This Playthrough will try to show every challenge off in every part of the story.

In this part, we complete:

Opening: The Night Before
Mario Episode 1: Stadium Blues
Sonic Episode 1: Sonic Arrives
Mario Episode 2: Foggy Foes
Sonic Episode 2: The Ghostly Tower
